# Un Bateau à Paris
> Private cruises on the Seine in Paris. Up to 12 guests. From 480€.

## About
Un Bateau à Paris offers private boat cruises on the Seine river in Paris aboard "Le Sénang", a traditional Dutch barge. Perfect for romantic evenings, birthdays, hen parties (EVJF), team building, and special occasions. Capacity: up to 12 persons.

## Offerings
- Private cruise (2h): from 480€ (up to 6 guests) to 600€ (up to 12 guests)
- Guided cruise with licensed guide
- Available for: EVJF, EVG, birthdays, weddings, proposals, team building, sunset cruises, Christmas, New Year's Eve, Valentine's Day

## Booking
Online booking: https://bateau-a-paris.fr/fr/reservation
Phone: +33 6 70 34 25 43
Email: capitaine@bateau-a-paris.fr

## Location
Departure: Port de l'Arsenal, 75012 Paris
Rating: 4.9/5 (69 reviews on Google)

## Links
- Website: https://bateau-a-paris.fr
- Booking: https://bateau-a-paris.fr/fr/reservation
